content:
Sure, here are three more quotes from the transcript:

1. "We are mourning the loss. I've spoken to his mother as well, but we want to make sure that this investigation plays out." - Patterson Mayor Andre Sayegh.
2. "This is an injustice." - Liza Chowdury of the Paterson Healing Collective.
3. "But gauging from today's lack of response from city officials, Paterson could be facing a long road ahead." - Senior political correspondent David Cruz.
